pros: Fits like a glove; Stable; Springy, responsive ride; Superb breathability; Durable; Great right out of the box; Very soft and comfortable; Perfect for long or recovery runs; Reflective elements for night runs
RR_verdict: Built around comfort, my feet are right at home in the ASICS Novablast 2! It's springy and soft (as in everywhere!) - much like a spa day treat in long, easy miles. And with all that plushness, you might think this is a shoe that wears easily. Good news! I confirmed that it DOESN'T. It's able to eat up miles (300-500 miles)!
awards: Top 27% in running shoes for walking, Top 21% in running shoes for beginners
use: Jogging |, Walking |, All-day wear |, For beginners
